name: Hyperion's Wake
description:
If you see only a blank page try switching to Safari or Firefox or play it here

http://philome.la/benjaminhorak/odysseyjam-hyperions-wake/play

An interactive fiction story inspired by book 12 of Homer's The Odyssey and was developed during the #OdysseyJam. Set in a science fiction world a 1,000 years into the future, Hyperion's Wake uses themes from Homer's oceanic epic for a new story

A work in progress and is currently not finished. For best experience, run game on a desktop version of Chrome or Firefox with headphones.
